mapper.select: SELECT h.class_id, h.quiz_h_title, h.quiz_h_content, h.quiz_h_file, h.quiz_h_id, h.quiz_h_seq, h.quiz_h_original, d.quiz_d_date, d.quiz_d_openday, d.quiz_d_closeday, d.quiz_d_id, d.quiz_h_id, cm.class_id FROM k_quiz_h as h JOIN k_quiz_d as d ON h.quiz_h_id = d.quiz_h_id JOIN k_class_member as cm ON h.class_id = cm.class_id WHERE cm.stu_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_quiz_d (quiz_d_date, quiz_d_openday, quiz_d_closeday, quiz_d_id, quiz_h_id) select date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{quizDOpenday}, #{quizDCloseday}, CONCAT("D", NEXTVAL(quiz_d_id_seq)), quiz_h_id from k_quiz_h where quiz_h_id = #{quizHId}
mapper.select: SELECT h.class_id, h.quiz_h_title, h.quiz_h_content, h.quiz_h_file, h.quiz_h_id, h.quiz_h_seq, h.quiz_h_original, d.quiz_d_date, d.quiz_d_openday, d.quiz_d_closeday, d.quiz_d_id, d.quiz_h_id FROM k_quiz_h as h JOIN k_quiz_d as d ON h.quiz_h_id = d.quiz_h_id WHERE h.quiz_h_seq = #{quizHSeq}

SELECT h.quiz_h_title, h.quiz_h_seq, h.class_id, c.class_to, d.quiz_d_date FROM k_quiz_h as h JOIN k_class as c ON h.class_id = c.class_id JOIN k_quiz_d as d ON d.quiz_h_id = h.quiz_h_id WHERE c.prof_id = #{userId};
